articles.title: Best ways to delay your periods without pills - Times of India
articles.description: While you can't outsmart mother nature, there are some commonly trusted remedies which may help delay the arrival of your periods.
articles.content: According to some beliefs, gelatin dissolved in warm water can push back periods by some hours, at least.However, do remember that this is not a science-backed measure.
